member.name: P:Galatea.AI.Abstract.BaseTemplate.CompareValue
member.summary: Gets a value unique to the Template for Comparison and Sorting.
member.remarks:
A Template that is more similar to the current instance will have a closer CompareValue than a Template that is less similar.
For example: if has a Hue value of 360, and has a Hue value of 180, then it can be stated that , with a Hue value of 348, is more similar.

member.name: M:Galatea.AI.Abstract.IBaseTemplateCollection.CreateFromPattern(System.Int32,Galatea.AI.Abstract.TemplatePatternCollection,System.String,Galatea.AI.Abstract.ICreator)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a type inherited from from a template pattern passed from the Recognition Model, applies the template name from User Feedback, and adds the new template to the collection.
member.param: The unique ID assigned by the Data Access Manager.
A collection of templates supplied by the Recognition Model. The template returned by the function will have the same attributes as the Pattern instance with a corresponding attribute.
The name of the template, parsed by the Language Model and passed along with User Feedback.
member.remarks: An example would be: The Recognition Model receives an entity representing an Orange Triangle. It identifies the shape as *Triangular, and the color as *Red. The Language Model determines from user feedback that the correct label for the color is *Orange. The Feedback Model will call this function to create a new template for Orange, using the Pattern collection of Color:255,255,0 Shape:Point,Point,Point
member.param: The component that created and labeled the .
